Employment_type:
Designation - Business Intelligence Engineer

Reporting to - CTO

Your responsibilities would include :

- Work with cross-functional user teams / Stakeholders to determine the metrics, reports, and analyses needed for decision-making.

- Retrieve and analyze data using SQL and/or other data management systems

- Develop queries for ad hoc requests and projects, as well as ongoing reporting.

- Monitor existing metrics, analyze data, and partner with other internal teams to identify and implement process and system improvements

- Design and support key datasets that provide structured and timely access to actionable business information with the needs of the end user always in view

- Present Data Insights to non-technical team members as well as technical team members using PPT or Reporting Dashboards.

- Work closely with Product team and stakeholders to guide product priorities based on Data available

The qualities we are looking for are :

- Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Analytics, Mathematics, Statistics or other quantitative discipline.

- Strong Experience in writing SQL queries and understanding of RDBMS System.

- Familiarity with theory and practice of statistics, information retrieval and data mining.

- Experience in scripting for automation (e.g. Python, Ruby, Perl).

- Experience using statistical packages and business intelligence tools such as R, Python etc.

- Experience in building dashboards and reports to surface business intelligence data.

- Knowledge of visualization platforms is a Plus

- Strong analytical and excellent problem solving skills.

- Proven interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

- Strong written and verbal skills - ability to present thoughts clearly in both verbal and written form to large cross-functional teams of technical and non-technical members and across hierarchy.

- Strong desire to push ideas into production

- Ability to deal with ambiguity and shifting priorities

Nice to have :

- Experience with R-shiny or Metabase, Mixpanel

- Experience with Postgresql & Query Optimization

- Understanding or experience with Google Analytics & Firebase would be a plus

- You- ve been working in self directed side projects

- Familiar with theory and practice of machine learning

Job description
This position is for Senior Yield Engineer in GLOBALFOUNDRIES India center at Bangalore, supporting 200mm wafer FAB in Burlington, Vermont, USA. The candidate will be responsible for functional/sort test monitoring, root cause analysis and related manufacturing operations.

Job Responsibilities

Identify maverick wafers after the functional/sort test by program and collect wafer spatial signals
Passionately work to correlate inline Wafer Electrical Test and Defects data to maverick wafers in order to identify the root cause of functional/sort test failure. Execute bin-2-defect analysis n maverick wafers.
Drive the segmentation of spatial patters at Functional/sort test based on type of the patterns namely photo pattern, repeaters, location sensitive patterns, edge patterns, CoW patterns and additional regrouping based on the failing sort bins
Work with respective teams and provide inputs to create apps for the local Yield Engineering needs
Actively learn G85 pick map editing tool and assist in inking out problematic die. Prior knowledge on die inking and related software tools is added plus
Summarize weekly WET signal package for specific technologies/ customers for internal use and also summarize CFM/PCM defect trends as needed
Clear reporting and communication of issues to Burlington teams on a daily basis
Must be flexible in job assignment and open to working on weekend shifts on rotational basis as required by the business

Required Qualifications:

B.E./B.Tech. or M.Sc./M.Tech. with 0-5 years of relevant experience in Electrical (Microelectronics)/ Electronics Engineering or Applied Physics
Good understanding of semiconductor process technology, solid state device physics and submicron device architectures
Decent critical thinking skills and basic understanding of statistical data analysis is required
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within a globally matrixed team or environment
Aggressive learner and a strong team player, excellent analytical skills, on-time delivery of assigned work
Excellent verbal and written communication
Scripting skills are a plus

Preferred Qualifications:

Hands on experience in wafer electrical/functional/sort test is strongly desired
Working experience in CMOS process and process module/equipment (200mm/300mm) is strongly preferred
Scripting skills with open source languages like R & Python is preferred

Dear Candidate,




Greetings from Kantar!!!




KAP Bangalore is pleased to announce the hiring of 2021 batch MBA/PGDM freshers for our Consultant role. If you wish to apply, kindly click on the below link to take the Online test:




https://app.mymapit.in/code4/tiny/y5XnHW




candidates who clear the online test will be contacted for the further Virtual Interview Process




ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA

Qualification: MBA/PGDM 2021 Batch.

(Students with active back log are not eligible to participate in the placement process with Kantar)

Compensation : Consultant - 7.15 Lakhs

**Looking For Immediate Joiners

Online Test Instructions:




1. Make sure you have stable internet connection.

2. Please use latest version browsers like Google Chrome” or “Mozilla Firefox” or “Opera”.

3. “Internet Explorer” will not support the test link.

4. If your computer is taking unexpected time to load, it is recommended to reboot the system before you start the test

5. Once you start the test, it is recommended to pursue it in one go for the complete duration.

6. While registering, uploading resumes is mandatory. Without resume the tool will not allow you to take the test. Please upload the resume with passport size photograph.

7. Make sure that the webcam is on while you are taking the test(mandatory)

8. Please shutdown all other browsers during the test duration. If you leave the test page and move to another browser, then the test will be terminated.

9. The test duration is 50 minutes, please make sure the test is taken before the cut-off time.

10. Usage of Head phones is strictly prohibited during the Test process and will lead to disqualification.


KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Help marketing clients to make smart decisions and then to implement and track them.
Manage day-to-day delivery along with analyst team
Co-ordination with analysts, statisticians, and lead project delivery
Playing a team management role
Help extract insights from consumer, sales and other data available and provide data analysis, synthesis & presentation support.




ESSENTIAL SKILLS AND QUALITIES

Good marketing domain knowledge and understanding, particularly in the consumer goods domain.
Should be good at Analytical thinking & breaking down large problems into solvable chunks.
Should be willing to continuously co-ordinate with onsite clients and offshore team in India.
Have a consulting orientation; gather different perspectives, examples and use them to enrich day-to-day work.

Roles and Responsibilities



Articulate the product vision to the team Lead, organize, inspire and unblock designers, developers, data scientists and others within the multidisciplinary team with sharp analysis and well-communicated decisions.

Design the roadmap for product creation, breaking up delivery into meaningful, achievable goals.

Plan the pipeline and make sure wherever possible, tech and design patterns are reused.

Interpret how customers use our live products and translate that data into new opportunities for features that solve real problems.

Translate user needs into compelling stories designers can use to draw user flows and interactions, and developers can use to build the product.

Identify opportunities for innovation and efficiency, and turn these insights into concrete outcomes that align with our strategy.

Define how your products get held to account, and make sure those metrics get tracked, including commercial accountability.

Advocate and promote work across doctors to encourage champions and early adopters.





Desired Candidate Profile



Degree & experience in Genomics, oncology exposure is a must.

Skills and experience for success.

Experience taking a product from discovery to running live.

Experience of leading a team, including ability to mentor, coach and create a collaborative environment.

Experience building and navigating complex, data heavy product suites.

Experience of agile development/delivery of digital services.

Successful at (and enjoy) collaborating with people from a variety of backgrounds.

Able to influence a range of stakeholders at a variety of seniorities in healthcare fraternity but also willing to listen and take on board other opinions and ideas.

Highly proactive and a practical problem solver who likes to figure stuff out rather than explaining why it can't be done.

Field1: Omics ScientistEnveda BiosciencesSend me jobs like thisApply
Field3: Job description   We are looking for a motivated Omics Scientist with proficiency in designing, planning, and executing diverse omics studies on mass spectrometry-based proteomics and metabolomics applications (both using LC-MS/MS), and transcriptomics using next generation sequencing (NGS) platforms.    You will primarily be responsible for experimental benchwork involving sample preparation strategies for metabolomics, proteomics, and transcriptomics from diverse biological materials (i.e., plant materials, biofluids, tissues, cell lines, etc.) for both quantitative and qualitative omics-based analysis.    Necessary skills (command line to GUI based tools) of data handling and analysis of these omics datasets are a plus. You will directly report to your team lead and coordinate with other members whenever needed and present the data as needed to the larger team over meetings that are virtual. You can expect rapid growth as you help the company succeed with your hard work, motivation, and creativity.    Key Responsibilities:     Sample handling, preparation, and data acquisition for high throughput Omics (metabolomics, proteomics, and transcriptomics) and multi-omics studies     Data analysis and interpretation with open source and commercial software tools for analysis of omics datasets for their biological interpretation     Operation of vendor software of LC GC systems for data acquisition and storage     Data archiving and analysis of complex plant extracts, biofluids, and tissue samples for mass spectrometry (LC-MS, GC-MS, MS/MS), and transcriptomics (NGS, microarrays) data acquisition     Qualitative and quantitative analysis of large-scale omics datasets     Preparation of SOPs, documentation, reports, presentations, and participation in internal/ external meetings     Candidate Must:     Demonstrate excellent oral and written communication skills     Work well within a fast-paced, dynamic, and team-oriented start-up environment     Possess excellent organizational, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills     Exhibit resourcefulness to do more with less in a startup environment     Key Skills Capabilities:     M.Sc in Chemistry/ Biochemistry/ Biotechnology/ Bioengineering or M.Pharm/ M.Tech required, PhD in relevant disciplines may also apply     Experience with research in any one area of phytochemistry, natural products, chemometrics, metabolite profiling, or a related field is required     A minimum of 2 years of relevant experience is required. Industry or CRO experience is a plus     Strong background in mass-spectrometry (LC-MS, GC-MS, MS/MS) and analytical method development, structural elucidation is required     Experience with spectral database construction, chemometric data interpretation, and analysis is a plus     Familiarity with computational tools and resources, organic chemistry, pharmacology, and drug discovery is a plus     Research experience abroad is preferred, but not required     Experience in electronic notebook systems is a plus   RoleResearch Scientist,Industry TypeMedical Devices & Equipment,Functional AreaResearch & Development,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryPharmaceutical & BiotechnologyEducationUG :Any GraduatePG :MS/M.Sc(Science) in Chemistry, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication, M.Pharma in PharmacyKey SkillsCell LinesAnalytical Method DevelopmentMass SpectrometryData InterpretationData AnalysisLc - Ms / MsResearchGcPhdOrganic Chemistry

Field1: Engineer Process EngineeringGLOBALFOUNDRIES Engineering Private Limited4.2(25 Reviews)Send me jobs like thisApply
Field3:
Job description
Introduction

This position is for a Metrology Engineer in GLOBALFOUNDRIES India center at Bangalore. Selected individual will work remotely with a dynamic team of world-class technical professionals at the GLOBALFOUNDRIES Fab 9 in Essex Jct., Vermont, USA. Metrology Process engineer is responsible for supporting manufacturing process operations and maintaining the overall quality of metrology measurements. In addition, the engineer is responsible for sustaining and improving productivity of tooling and processes used to provide critical feedback to other process modules

Job Responsibilities

Monitor all qualified processes using SPC and other statistical tools.
Setup recipes/job files in all metrology tools in the Module. Do regular housekeeping of production job files.
Perform data analysis of key performance indicators used to diagnose and resolve issues in the sector to increase process quality and yield.
Communicate effectively (written and verbal) with colleagues, customers, and suppliers
Support of manufacturing counterparts during periods of high WIP through sampling reductions and staffing support
Provide proper and accurate passdown of line issues, outstanding follow-up tasks and documentation.
Perform all activities in a safe and responsible manner and support all Environmental, Health, Safety & Security requirements and programs

Must be flexible in job assignment and ready to work on weekend shifts on a rotational basis as required by the business

Required Qualifications:

B.E./B.Tech./M.Sc with 0-5 years of relevant experience in Electrical (Microelectronics)/ Electronics Engineering or Applied Physics
Solid understanding of SPC, data driven decision making and able to demonstrate problem solving skills through control documented processes to minimize risk.
Basic knowledge of semiconductor processing and technology is required.
Working experience in CMOS process and process module/equipment (200mm/300mm) are strongly desired
Hands-on experience with CD-SEMs, Film thickness measurement tools, surface topology profilers and litho overlay equipment will bring added advantage
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within a globally matrixed team or environment
Aggressive learner and a strong team player, excellent analytical skills, on-time delivery of assigned work
Excellent verbal and written communication

Preferred Qualifications:

Candidates with hands on experience on SPC, measurement of thickness, SEM, OCD and problem-solving skills.
Strong understanding of semiconductor IC manufacturing processes.

Job description

Context: Within the scope of the Systems Engineering for Standard Parts, the jobholder will contribute towards the Digitalization and Data Analysis for Qualification of System Standard Parts and associated processes.




Details: The jobholder will contribute to Digitalization of System Standard Parts development process and qualification activities by analysing the existing qualification data and processes, leading the digitalization initiatives. The job will also require liaising with different departments in Airbus, managing supplier and in service data and analysing data for all Airbus aircraft programs.




Main activities:

Learn and Develop Lean Agile Leadership

Understand customer needs

Review and prioritize the requirements or user stories

Define Sprint / Iteration Objectives

Contribute in preparing the Release Plan / Program Increment (PI) Plan

Manage Digitalisation projects for the domain

Develop meaningful user stories

Ensure the quality of user stories by validating the user stories

Design the application design and develop code if necessary

Undertake Data Analysis projects on existing Qualification data

Identify improvements and propose solutions to Digitalise existing processes.




Required Domain Expertise:

Graduate/Post Graduate Engineer (Mechanical/Aerospace Engineering) with 0-2 yrs experience Experience: 0-2 yrs.




Required Technical Expertise:

Exposure to use of Coding tools and methods for analysing data for Pattern Analysis and/or Data analysis in the aerospace & aviation domain.

Exposure to R, Python and SQL and VB.

Interest to work in the combined area of Aerospace and use of modern tools.

Project management

Overall understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)

Strong communication skills

Agile Processes (SAFe / Scrum / Kanban) - Option




JOB DISCLAIMER AND NOTIFICATION

We bring to the notice of all concerned that Airbus Group India Pvt. Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "AIG") follows a fair and merit-based employee selection and recruitment practice.




Airbus Group India does not:

1. Send job offers from free email services including but not limited to Gmail, Rediffmail, Yahoo mail, Hotmail and others.

2. Authorize anyone to either collect money or arrive at any monetary arrangement in return for a job at AIG.

3. Charge / accept any form of consideration or security deposit from job seekers and applicants during any stage of the selection and/ or recruitment process.

4. Request for your credit card number or bank account number.

It has come to our attention that fake job offers under the aegis of Airbus India or Airbus Group India Pvt. Ltd. have been circulated by unauthorized personnel.




On receipt of an interview call for any job at AIG, the candidate may take some measures such as visiting the official website or career site of Airbus to get the contact details to enquire with the Human Resources department of Airbus India regarding such jobs and/or the interview details and any other relevant information.




For further information on Airbus India Careers, please click here.

Please check www.airbus.com to get the contact details and enquire with the company to confirm if any information that you have received are genuine; do not respond to any fraudulent communication.




AIG will not be responsible to anyone acting on an employment offer not directly made by Airbus Group India Pvt Ltd. Anyone making an employment offer in return for money or other type of gain is not authorized by AIG and is not offering an approved job. AIG reserves the right to take legal action, including criminal action, against such individuals/entities.

Seeks discrepancies and inconsistencies in available information; explains variances.    IT: a Business Within a Business: Performs security initiatives for current business applications within the IT environment. Diagnoses and reports minor or routine IT business service problems. Utilizes tools, techniques and practices for identifying and validating business opportunities. Establishes business assessment procedures for multiple or critical applications. Conducts, documents and communicates basic business assessment reviews and walkthroughs.    Requirements Analysis: Trains others on requirements workthroughs and quality reviews. Ensures the successful completion of all major activities, tasks and deliverables pertaining to the requirement analysis stage. Plays an active or leading role in recording and storing requirement documents in various forms. Supervises the advanced use of requirements analysis tools and services, including prototyping and use cases. Produces detailed functional and information requirements models and documentation. Utilizes automated diagramming tools to ensure traceability of requirements.    Workflow Analysis: Discusses and evaluates the new workflow and its approaches. Directs the implementation of workflow mapping and automation. Analyzes each departments reports to optimize the existing workflow. Monitors the use of major functions and features in workflow analysis applications.    ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning): Evaluates the ERP systems best practices to learn its principles and applications. Consults on how to effectively integrate ERP systems with other platforms within the organization. Monitors all ERP users to comply with established operational guidelines and standards. Evaluates the benefits and drawbacks of an organizations own ERP system for further improvement. Advises the ERP design team on ERP systems requirements. Resolves all technical and administrative problems that occur throughout the ERP design and implementation process.    ERP Implementation: Consults on how to prioritize during the planning phase of ERP implementation projects. Guides end users on the utilization of complex or advanced functions in the ERP system. Directs and organizes all ERP system integration and customization processes. Supervises implementation processes to ensure time and budget requirements are met.    Service Request Management Process (TCS): Employs alternative methods for verifying and prioritizing service request completion. Collaborates with the design and development of service request process flow and templates. Directs the processes and activities for handling non-standard or unsupported service requests. Designs the process and shows the associated costs for different types of requests. Researches new tools and techniques for monitoring service gaps and improving effectiveness. Receives, verifies and dispatches the full spectrum of service requests.    Addressing Customer Needs: Performs sales activities for most or all products available in diverse product lines and multiple markets. Sells to a wide variety of customers in different industries or walks of life. Advises others on how to adjust communication style to suit customer communication preferences. Alters the sales message to highlight product benefits to different customers and circumstances.
